info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 4:07PM PDT until September 10 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Nye County in south central Nevada... West Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 407 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Pahrump along Highway 160. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pahrump, Red Rock Canyon, Blue Diamond, Lovell Canyon Campground, Mountain Springs, Rocky Gap Campground, Spring Mountain Ranch and Mt. Potosi. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
